TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 包含值，這些值會指定傳回使用者介面自動化項目時所使用的參考型別。

span.span: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements.
These values are used in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完整是預設值，並指定傳回項目包含完整的參考至基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。Full is the default, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 無指定傳回項目沒有參考至基礎的 UI，並包含快取的資訊。None specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying UI, and contain only cached information. 在元素上，某些作業例如或，需要完整的參考; 嘗試對這些項目，並沒有任何會導致。Certain operations on elements, such as or , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 使用 無會比較有效率時需要只有屬性，因為它可避免額外負荷涉及設定完整的參考。Using None can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將模式設定上。The following example shows how to set the mode on a . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定傳回的項目要完整參考基礎 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定傳回的項目不必參考基礎 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，只要包含快取資訊。

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

summary.span: 本模式可能的用途，例如：不必取得項目本身的參考，即可擷取清單方塊內項目的名稱。

span.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
